'''Thespian Tricks''' are special photo poses. Tricks can be used during [[Photo Mode]].

Every character has the Alpha Pose, Standby and Thinking pose. These are automatically unlocked upon obtaining a character.

Certain characters have additional poses available from [[Wolfy]] in [[Imaginarium Theater]] by exchanging [[Toy Medal]]s. Tricks normally cost {{Item|Toy Medal|30|x=1}}.
